name: Dart
tagline: Brainstorm, plan, and execute faster with chat and AI agents
description: Dart now combines AI chat and agents into a one-of-a-kind project management tool. Brainstorm, plan, and track projects effortlessly by talking to AI. Then deploy specialized and even custom agents to handle any type of work you‚Äôve mapped out.

name: Animant 2.0
tagline: Go beyond static presentations
description: Bring your presentations, lessons, and stories to life with Animant ‚Äî the immersive presentation app that goes beyond the slideshow. Combine audio, video, PDFs, and interactive 3D models into time-synced experiences that engage, explain, and inspire.

name: Pola Browser
tagline: Organized browser
description: The productivity browser for Mac. Folders, fast profile switching, research mode, Shortcuts and more

name: Fred
tagline: Fred turns your ideas into actionable goals and steps
description: Fred is your personal goal setting companion. Dream big, break goals into actionable steps, and keep your progress visible with vision boards, now in a sleek web app you can use anywhere.

tagline: Find dog-friendly hotels and their pet policies
description: Hotels so goob they welcome goob bois and girls üê∂

name: Ordinary
tagline: Simple page maker to refresh the ordinary
description: Website building anxiety ends here. Ordinary is the free site maker that‚Äôs fast, simple & ridiculously good-looking.

name: LettuceTalk
tagline: AI caregiving conversation cards for bilingual families
description: It's hard to talk to your aging parents about their care, especially for families with language barriers. LettuceTalk makes those conversations joyful and easy with multilingual prompts on caregiving for the whole family, customizable online with AI.

name: WorkElate
tagline: AI-powered workflow for smarter teams and seamless growth
description: WorkElate is an AI-driven platform that streamlines workflows, automates task management, and connects teams across all stages of work. From idea to execution, it empowers businesses to work smarter, boost productivity, and drive continuous growth

name: Mindmap Generator
tagline: Create mind maps instantly | quinnsy
description: Generate beautiful mind maps from text or documents in seconds. Free AI-powered mindmap generator with no signup required. Perfect for brainstorming, note-taking, and visual learning.

name: Collect,Showcase& Grow with Testimonials
tagline: Collect, manage & showcase reviews that drive conversions.
description: Easily collect video,text & Voice testimonials with custom forms and display them in stunning widgets. Our all-in-one platform helps you manage, and showcase social proof to build trust and boost credibility. Start for free!

name: Voxcruit
tagline: Your 24/7 AI Interviewer
description: Voxcruit is your 24/7 AI interviewer. Resume-aware, voice-powered, and fully autonomous, it asks smart questions, transcribes answers, scores responses, and gives instant recommendations. Fast, fair, and affordable hiring at scale.

name: Revplies
tagline: Automate Google reviews with AI powered Replies
description: üöÄ Revplies helps businesses automate Google review replies with AI. Personalize with templates, toggle automation per location, and manage multiple profiles in one dashboard‚Äîsaving time while boosting customer trust.

name: ZASSHA
tagline: Record your PC once. AI builds clear manuals automatically
description: AI-powered tool that automatically converts screen recordings into video-enhanced step-by-step manuals. By capturing work once, you can instantly generate clear documentation, reduce training costs, and improve productivity across operations.

name: Codenhack
tagline: Where coding meets the underground
description: Codenhack is a gamified coding platform where you learn by doing. Take structured courses (HTML, CSS, JS, Python, Vue, React & more), read/write blogs, and build personal projects we call hacks. Earn XP, coins, and badges as you level up your coding journey.

name: What Is My Screen Size?
tagline: Free screen resolution checker tool
description: Instantly discover your device's screen dimensions, resolution, and display specifications. Free tool to check screen size, pixel density, and more.

name: Vibe Code Anywhere (Vicoa)
tagline: Ship faster with Claude Code anytime, anywhere
description: Vicoa lets you use Claude Code anywhere, on any device. Start coding on your laptop, switch easily to mobile or web, get alerts when your AI agent needs input, and approve changes with one tap.

name: AI Memory Layer for ChatGPT and Claude.
tagline: Shared persistent memory across all your LLMs.
description: We intelligently capture, store, and inject context into your LLMs. Your AI finally remembers conversations, preferences, and project details across sessions. Works with ChatGPT, Claude, and other MCP enabled LLMs. Setup in 30 seconds.

name: English For Tech Program
tagline: All-in-one program to upgrade your English and tech career
description: Comprehensive English and soft skills level-up program for tech professionals, now with personalized mentor support and optimized curriculum.

name: Near: P2P Social Network
tagline: Peer-to-Peer Social Network. Proximity based. Ephemeral.
description: A new way to connect with the world around you. A peer-to-peer model it's adopted. Using your device's Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, it creates a local network with those nearby (‚âà100m). Communicate with others directly, without a central server, or an account.
